posts.post_title: 1909-11 T206 Tom Guiheen Southern Leaguer SGC A (Sold)
posts.post_content:
Tom Guiheen Southern Leaguer w Old Mill back

SGC A (Evidence of Trimming)

Looks EX/MT but the TPG has spoken.

$250 PPFF (Free Shipping) VCP price avg. for a 6 $2300 - Has the look but alas it is what it is!!!

Reduced to $225 PPFF
I know this may upset the rating gods... but you can always crack it and resend.. thats a big diff in price...
